resources.string: Allow the app to control the usage of the Fingerprint Reader.
Wipe device after 10 incorrect device-unlock passwords/pins/patterns has been entered

This app needs Device Administrator permissions in order to disable the use of the fingerprint on the lockscreen and for wiping the device after too many incorrect device-unlock password. Nothing else is done with this permission. Sadly I don\'t know how to request only the necessary permissions for the current selected options (e.g. only disable-keyguard-features for \"Disable Fingerprint…\" and only watch-login/wipe-data for \"Wipe device…\" - that why I request all three Device Administrator permissions at one. This app has NO network access so it is impossible to control it remotely.
